For all lifetime you can keep your body and mind in shape when you take to letting nature heal your body and soul with a regular hiking trip pushed into your schedule. These Salomon Switch 2CS WP Hiking Boots will ensure you are protected in the best way possible with cutting edge crafting solutions. The dark sand body is made with waterproof oiled nubuck leather and boasts gusseted tongue

giving you flexibility and energy return.

  • The use of Thinsulate in the crafting of the outers of these shoes help the feet retain the right temperature by allowing moisture and sweat to seep out through the gaps between the fibers of the material.
